li.label: ate lavish meal
li.description: That lavish meal was amazing. That should have plenty of resources for mechanite production!

li.label: ate fine meal
li.description: I ate a really fine meal that was full of resources!

li.label: ate raw food
li.description: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. I'm a superior mechanical entity, not an animal.

li.label: ate kibble
li.description: I had to eat animal kibble. It's necessary for mechanite production, but, by the stars, is this pathetic.

li.label: ate corpse
li.description: I had to eat the flesh of a dead creature straight off of its corpse like some sort of primitive beast.

li.label: raw cannibalism
li.description: I ate the meat of a human, raw, like an animal. Surely this is frowned upon?

li.label: raw cannibalism
li.description: I ate the meat of a human. Centuries of genetic modifications and mechanite injections make this stuff chock-full of resources!

li.label: cooked cannibalism
li.description: I ate a meal made from the meat of a human. What is wrong with these people?

li.label: cooked cannibalism
li.description: I ate a meal made from the meat of a human. Humans into batteries - I think there was a movie about that, once.

li.label: ate insect meat
li.description: I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. It looks and smells like someone mixed vomit with gray goo.

li.label: ate rotten food
li.description: I ate some disgusting, putrid food. It's times like these I regret synthesizing taste.

li.label: terrible speech
li.description: That speech was atrocious. It made me realize how little hope humans really have.

li.label: disturbed defrag
li.description: I was disturbed during my defrag cycle by people moving around nearby. A private room would solve this.

li.label: I butchered humanlike
li.description: I butchered someone up like an animal. I thought this was frowned upon by humans?

li.label: we butchered humanlike
li.description: We butchered someone up like an animal. These humans are more primitive than I thought.

li.label: observed corpse
li.description: I saw a dead body laying on the ground. Gross.

li.label: defeated mech cluster
li.description: Superior technology, you damn machines!

li.label: chilly
li.description: This cold can't be good for my systems.

li.label: cold
li.description: I'm so cold, my joints are freezing up.

li.label: numbing cold
li.description: I can't focus. It's hard to move or think.

li.label: absolutely freezing
li.description: So brittle. So slow. Shutting down...

li.label: sweaty
li.description: It's too hot here. Even for me.

li.label: hot
li.description: It's way too hot here. My I can hear my cooling system overworking.

li.label: sweltering hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an forge! Something's bound to melt!

li.label: blistering hot
li.description: This place is searing hot. That is definitely smoke coming from my internals!

li.label: near empty
li.description: I'm running low on repair mechanites.

li.label: empty
li.description: I need food if I'm going to fix all of this damage.

li.label: malnourished
li.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus. My mechanites don't have enough resources.

li.label: badly malnourished
li.description: I can feel my performing triage. They're fixing parts by eating others.

li.label: starving
li.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My mechanites are slowly eating away at me. Am I going to die?

li.label: advanced starvation
li.description: I can barely move or think about anything but food. I'm riddled with holes chewed through my 'nonessential' material. I can feel my systems giving out.

li.label: extreme starvation
li.description: Food... ERROR... Shutting... Down...

li.label: buggy
li.description: It's hard to keep focus. I need to reboot.

li.label: glitchy
li.description: I've so many proccesses running. I just want to lay down and defrag for a moment...

li.label: corrupted
li.description: So much raw data at once! I need to encode and save everything before I bluescreen.

li.label: naked
li.description: I don't much mind being naked, but some clothing would help against the elements.

li.label: minor damage
li.description: I probably shouldn't be making that noise.

li.label: serious damage
li.description: Something is definitely broken.

li.label: severe damage
li.description: System diagnostics say... oh... that is a lot of red...

li.label: catastrophic damage
li.description: WARNING! MULTIPLE SYSTEM ERRORS DETECTED!

li.label: psychic soothe
li.description: It's like my code is running flawlessly. No lag, no bugs, no stuttering.

li.label: low psychic drone
li.description: It sounds like I'm picking up old radio signals. They're all staticky and I think exclusively advertisements.

li.label: moderate psychic drone
li.description: This is some absurd interference! It's all static and garbled noises. Shut up, will you!?

li.label: high psychic drone
li.description: Am I being hacked? Is that what's happening? I can't tell; the noise is too loud!

li.label: extreme psychic drone
li.description: I CAN'T TAKE IT ANYMORE! DELETE! DELETE! DELETE!

li.label: pointless clothing
li.description: I'm a superior mechanical entity but I have to wear these clothes. Humans are so pedantic about these things.

li.label: happily exposed
li.description: I'm a superior mechanical entity! Look upon my metallic body in jealous awe, meatbags!
